calculatorName: ARISCAT Score for Postoperative Pulmonary Complications

cases.description: Lowest risk - young patient, normal SpO2, no risk factors, peripheral surgery <2hrs
cases.source: Canet J, et al. Anesthesiology. 2010;113(6):1338-1350. All defaults = 0.

cases.description: Low risk - age 51-80, otherwise no risk factors
cases.source: Canet J, et al. Anesthesiology. 2010. Age 51-80 (+3) = 3.

cases.description: Intermediate risk - age 51-80, SpO2 91-95%, upper abdominal surgery
cases.source: Canet J, et al. Anesthesiology. 2010. Age (+3) + SpO2 (+8) + Upper abd (+15) = 26.

cases.description: High risk - age >80, SpO2 <=90%, intrathoracic surgery, >3hrs, emergency
cases.source: Canet J, et al. Anesthesiology. 2010. Age (+16) + SpO2 (+24) + Intrathoracic (+24) + >3hrs (+23) + Emergency (+8) = 95.

cases.description: Borderline high risk - age 51-80, respiratory infection, anemia, 2-3hr surgery, emergency
cases.source: Canet J, et al. Anesthesiology. 2010. Age (+3) + Resp infection (+17) + Anemia (+11) + 2-3hrs (+16) + Emergency (+8) = 55.
